verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees בְּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> turned again יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> When the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁיבַ֣ת <S%H7870><s%> the captivity צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion הָ֝יִ֗ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּחֹלְמִֽים׃ <S%H2492><s%> we were like them that dream

אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Then יִמָּלֵ֪א <S%H4390><s%> filled שְׂח֡וֹק <S%H7814><s%> with laughter פִּינוּ֮ <S%H6310><s%> Then was our mouth וּלְשׁוֹנֵ֪נוּ <S%H3956><s%> and our tongue רִ֫נָּ֥ה <S%H7440><s%> with singing אָ֭ז <S%H227><s%> Then יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> then said בַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> they among the heathen הִגְדִּ֥יל <S%H1431><s%> great things יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> hath done עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> another

הִגְדִּ֣יל <S%H1431><s%> great things יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> hath done עִמָּ֗נוּ <S%H5973><s%> with הָיִ֥ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> become שְׂמֵחִֽים׃ <S%H8056><s%> for us [whereof] we are glad

שׁוּבָ֣ה <S%H7725><s%> Turn again יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [שְׁבוּתֵנוּ כ] (שְׁבִיתֵ֑נוּ <S%H7622><s%> captive ק) כַּאֲפִיקִ֥ים <S%H650><s%> as the streams בַּנֶּֽגֶב׃ <S%H5045><s%> in the south
הַזֹּרְעִ֥ים <S%H2232><s%> They that sow בְּדִמְעָ֗ה <S%H1832><s%> in tears בְּרִנָּ֥ה <S%H7440><s%> in joy יִקְצֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H7114><s%> shall reap

הָ֘ל֤וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> forth יֵלֵ֨ךְ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> to and fro וּבָכֹה֮ <S%H1058><s%> and weepeth נֹשֵׂ֪א <S%H5375><s%> bearing מֶֽשֶׁךְ־ <S%H4901><s%> precious הַ֫זָּ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed בֹּֽא־ <S%H935><s%> shall doubtless יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> come בְרִנָּ֑ה <S%H7440><s%> again with rejoicing נֹ֝שֵׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> bringing אֲלֻמֹּתָֽיו׃ <S%H485><s%> his sheaves
